headline: Rising: May 2, 2022
sentences:
Bidens new DISINFORMATION board leader thought Hunter laptop story was Russian misinfo: Robby Soave
Robby Soave criticizes the Biden administrations new disinformation governance board underneath the Department of Homeland Security.

Elites, media BLOVIATE about democracy at TONE-DEAF correspondents dinner: Batya Ungar-Sargon

Chomsky: TRUMP is the only Western politician whos right on Russia-Ukraine
Briahna Joy Gray and Robby Soave react to a controversial interview from Leftist thinker Noam Chomsky.

Ron DeSantis has made Florida new GROUND ZERO for the culture war: Panel
Kristal Knight and Sam Geduldig discuss Governor Ron DeSantis stoking of the culture war in Florida.

AOCs response to Americans whove already paid off student loans: not every program is for everyone
Briahna Joy Gray and Robby Soave debate student loan debt cancellation.
Briahna Joy Gray and Robby Soave discuss House Speaker Nancy Pelosis visit to Poland, and question whether the U.S. aims to engage in a proxy war with Russia.

CNN blasts Musk, Trump for opening gates to Hell
